Please note that we could have also performed this computation with our calculator
in BGN mode as an annuity due. To do this, put your calculator in BGN mode [2nd
[BGN] [2nd] [SET] [2nd] [QUIT] on the TI or [g] (BEG] on the HP. Then enter:
N = 30; PMT = -25,000; I/Y = 10; CPT + PV = 259,240.14
